CustomField.description: Offer documents cannot be generated if: the case is not approved, the case is closed, or the Parent OR Contractor account is not verified.
CustomField.formula: IF( IsClosed = true || CONTAINS( Parent_Contractor_Account_Verified__c, 'Not Verified') || ISPICKVAL(Brand__c,'') || ClaimApproved__c = false, 1, 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is a 1, the Offer cannot be generated.
CustomField.label: Conga: Release Not Allowed
